features.featureTitle: Implement a Home Screen as the default landing view. It must display the app logo (generated icon), the title 'MY REMINDER' in large bold typography, a short tagline, and a prominent 'Set Destination' button styled with a golden/yellow fill on a dark background. The screen should use a dark cinematic black background (#0A0A0A / #111111) with yellow/golden accent color (#F5C518 or similar). Use rounded cards and Material Design–inspired layout suitable for mobile viewports.

Implement a Destination Input Screen accessible from the Home Screen. It must include: (1) a styled search bar with a location pin icon and placeholder text 'Search destination…', (2) a map preview area rendered as a static visual placeholder card (no real GPS/map API) showing a stylized dark map tile with a golden marker pin, and (3) a 'Next' or 'Set Alert' button at the bottom to proceed to the Alert Settings screen. Maintain dark background and golden accent styling consistent with the Home Screen.

Implement an Alert Settings Screen accessible from the Destination Input Screen. It must include: (1) a section titled 'Remind Me Before Arrival' with three selectable option chips/buttons for '1 min', '2 min', and '5 min' — only one can be active at a time, highlighted in golden yellow when selected; (2) a sound toggle switch labeled 'Sound Alert' styled with a golden active state; (3) a 'Save Reminder' button as the primary CTA at the bottom; and (4) a back navigation option. All state (selected time option, sound toggle) is managed locally in React state.

Implement a multi-screen navigation system (using React state or a simple router) connecting the three screens: Home → Destination Input → Alert Settings → (on save) Home. Include a top navigation bar on the Destination Input and Alert Settings screens with a back arrow icon and the current screen title in golden text.

Apply a consistent dark cinematic design system across all screens: background color #0A0A0A or #111111, primary accent color golden yellow (#F5C518 or #FFD700), all interactive cards and containers use rounded corners (border-radius ~16px), typography is modern sans-serif (e.g., Inter or system-ui) with varying weights, minimal iconography using outline-style icons, and the overall aesthetic targets young adult users with a professional and intuitive feel inspired by Android Material Design 3.
Render the app in a mobile-frame wrapper (max-width ~390px, centered on desktop) to simulate a smartphone display, with a subtle dark outer frame or shadow to reinforce the mobile app aesthetic.
